name: YouTube Custom Background Remastered
description:
Totally reworked from scratch. Doesn't lag anymore. And most importantly, it fucking works.

Featuring:

  • RGB Country Code
  • YouTube Premium Logo made in PornHub theme
  • RGB Author Background
  • Bigger Theater Mode
  • Colorful Like/Dislike ratio
  • And shit ton more changes that I'm too lazy to describe
    • It still in W.I.P but most of the site is complete, i still have whole YouTube Studio to do, soo i do not recommend using it in YT Studio yet.<./i>
additional_info: I've just fucking realized that my youtube page was at 90% zoom, and everything is fucked up on 100% XDDD Will fix this tomorrow edit: this shit might take a long time, I need to rewrite half of the code to make it work on every zoom level, monitor and anything else that changes the width and height of divs, fuuuck 19.04.21 8AM YouTube Studio Update 18.04.21 Finally it arrived, EVERYTHING at YouTube Studio is supported, even video editing. This build is beta, everything should work fine, but there might be still some bugs like some random boxes flickering from time to time, can't identify them and why its happening. They are rather small so they shouldn't bother anyone. Some bitch-ass hidden options might not work properly, but its not very likely, I was absolutely everywhere and changed/fixed everything I saw. sorry you had to wait more than 4 months for this, i'm a lazy bitch and was playing skyrim (: Update 1 05.03.21 -changed the way how RGB Country code works -updated font color on upload tab -album list on search tab has black background now
